item.title: Mastering Google Search
item.description: There will be a time in ones life when one has to search something on google and wondered only if I could have some more functionality to refine my search. Well there is but for those who seek, will find it. Google is a very powerfull tool for the ones who know how to use it. I myself was unaware of some of theses and got to know it when I was presented with a problem.
